Data: 10.15am Australia won the toss and will bat Peter Forrest replaces Steve Smith and Johnson confirmed as Cummins' replacement. For England, Jade Dernbach on his home ground comes in for James Anderson.
Australia Watson, Warner, Forrest, Clarke, Hussey, Bailey, Wade, Johnson, Lee, McKay, Doherty
10.30am Let's confirm the teams then... England Bell, Cook, Trott, Bopara, Morgan, Kieswetter, Bresnan, Broad, Swann, Dernbach, Finn

Positive signs for England would you say with these team changes for Australia? Obviously the injury to Cummins can't be helped but the change of Smith for Forrest is obviously designed to bolster their batting, fearful of England's powerful bowling line-up?

Alastair Cook says England would have bowled first, interesting. No worries for their team with a straight swap, Dernbach for Anderson with Jade coming in on his home ground and he will be desperate to impress.

"I'm very sorry to hear that Pat Cummins is out of the tour, injured yet again. The prospect of having discovered a new Dennis Lillee was thrilling, but unfortunately it seems Australia might have discovered a new Ryan Harris." Indeed disappointing John, hopefully he's a young man who will get stronger an
Here we go then, Steven Finn to open the bowling to Shane Watson...
Finn to Watson, 1 leg bye full and off the pads to square leg
Finn to Warner, FOUR runs terrible delivery, wide full toss and hammered through point for four
Finn to Warner, no run much better, on a length just outside off and left alone
Finn to Warner, no run back of a length on a similar line and blocked back up the wicket
Finn to Warner, no run tucked to point from a similar delivery
Finn to Warner, no run ends with a good one, shaping away from Warner and beating his defensive push from the crease
Dernbach to Watson, 1 run full and the ball shaping away, Watson forward to angle down to third man
Dernbach to Warner, no run full and wide, Warner chased it, swung and missed
Dernbach to Warner, no run tighter line and blocked into the covers
Dernbach to Warner, no run length outside off and left alone
Dernbach to Warner, no run wide and perhaps not short enough to cut and Warner just slaps it into the ground
Dernbach to Warner, no run length and this comes back to strike the pad, a brief cry for lbw but too high, good delivery that
Finn to Watson, 1 run full and clipped powerfully not wide enough of mid on who slides and saves well to his right
Finn to Warner, no run a cracker, squaring Warner up and beating him outside the off stump, great length and left him

Finn to Warner, 1 run full and striking the pad, the umpire doesn't signal anything so reckons Warner hit this, was close otherwise, might have missed off stump anyway but he did hit it, another excellent delivery
Finn to Watson, 1 run another good length, Watson forward to drive gets an inside edge past the stumps to square leg
Finn to Warner, no run back of a length, Warner stays back and blocks
Finn to Warner, 1 leg bye too straight now and off the pad wide of Kieswetter for a single
Dernbach to Warner, no run full again causes problems for Warner, he swings across a full straight ball that just misses the inside edge and the off stump
Dernbach to Warner, no run length and pushed to point
Dernbach to Warner, no run short and pulled to mid on, wasn't timed
Dernbach to Warner, FOUR runs pulled again towards mid on but this goes under Cook and away for four, probably wasn't a chance but it was an awkward one that he couldn't get behind
Dernbach to Warner, 1 run full outside off played forward off the outer half of the bat to third man, Finn scrambles well to save two
Dernbach to Watson, no run off stump and blocked

Finn to Warner, OUT and there is the wicket! Pulled straight up and into the hands of square leg. It was short and slightly wide, Warner tried to fetch it to leg and was late on the stroke, getting a top edge that looped up to square leg. Big wicket for England and the extra pace of Finn tells again
Finn to Watson, no run forward to drive powerfully to mid off
Finn to Watson, 1 run back of a length and guided down nicely to third man
Finn to Forrest, no run angled in, off the pad down the leg side but no shot offered so dead ball
Finn to Forrest, no run half-forward to block into the covers just outside off stump
Finn to Forrest, no run striking the pad again as Forrest looked to turn a length ball to leg
Dernbach to Watson, FOUR runs full and leg side and whipped past midwicket, poor ball nicely put away

Dernbach to Watson, no run full and driven at, edged and dropped in the gully and it's Trott to put the catch down. It was angled in and the drive produced a very thick edge but a diving Trott couldn't hold it going to his right, it was a good height and a bad miss
Dernbach to Watson, no run forward to block on off stump
Dernbach to Watson, FOUR runs oh lovely, just guided away from a length outside off past point, super timing
Dernbach to Watson, FOUR runs and now cut for four more, that was short and wide and hammered away
Dernbach to Watson, no run length and blocked around off stump
Finn to Forrest, no run off stump and blocked coming forward
Finn to Forrest, no run forward and blocked to point, better footwork
Finn to Forrest, no run back of a length now and blocked
Finn to Forrest, no run blocked in a similar region
Finn to Forrest, 1 run little straight and whipped out to long leg
Finn to Watson, 1 wide short and drifts down leg side for a wide, was that actually out of the batsman's reach? Seemed to be very close to leg stump but rules are rules
Finn to Watson, no run forward blocking on a length on off stump
Dernbach to Forrest, no run bumper and swayed outside the line
Dernbach to Forrest, no run wide of off stump and Forrest goes a long way out to follow it as it just shaped away, a goodun
Dernbach to Forrest, no run length around off stump, blocked to midwicket
Dernbach to Forrest, no run fuller and blocked to mid off
Dernbach to Forrest, no run full and driven again to mid off
Dernbach to Forrest, no run blocked with soft hands around off stump
Finn to Watson, 1 run back of a length, tried to be guided to third man again, comes off high on the pad and towards slip who parries on the bounce
Finn to Forrest, 1 run turned off a length to long leg
Finn to Watson, no run forward and blocked around off stump
Finn to Watson, 1 run guided to third man from quite a tight line, stayed leg side of the ball and chopped it down
Finn to Forrest, 1 wide leg side wide
Finn to Forrest, no run blocked around off stump
Finn to Forrest, no run left this time outside off
Bresnan to Watson, FOUR runs starts with a wide loosener and gets slapped through extra cover
Bresnan to Watson, no run full and driven again, the stumps do the fielding at the non-striker's end
Bresnan to Watson, 1 run played forward towards mid on and they scamper through for a sharp single
Bresnan to Forrest, 3 runs this is better for Forrest, flicked wide of mid on for three on the front foot
Bresnan to Watson, FOUR runs leg side and tickled for four
Bresnan to Watson, no run forward and blocked around off stump
Broad to Forrest, 2 runs full on middle and leg and flicked behind square on the leg side
Broad to Forrest, no run forward and blocked to mid off
Broad to Forrest, 1 run leg stump and worked to deep square leg
Broad to Watson, no run nice-looking drive and blocked by Broad getting down low well
Broad to Watson, no run back of a length, tried to be pulled but he played over the top of it, wasn't quite short enough
Broad to Watson, no run length and pushed to point from outside off
Bresnan to Forrest, no run length outside off and pushed to point
Bresnan to Forrest, 2 runs length and worked down to long leg, Finn comes across quickly to field
Bresnan to Forrest, no run length outside off and pushed to point
Bresnan to Forrest, 1 run worked from middle and leg down to long leg
Bresnan to Watson, no run length on middle and off, coming forward to block
Bresnan to Watson, 1 run little bit of width and a back of a length ball chopped to third man
Broad to Watson, no run off stump line, tucked to midwicket with a typically-Watson big stride forward
Broad to Watson, no run played back up the wicket to a length ball
Broad to Watson, 2 runs length and dropped through midwicket, they scramble well for two
Broad to Watson, 2 runs driven off an inside edge past the stumps to long leg, Bresnan slides and saves the boundary
Broad to Watson, 2 leg byes leg side, off the pad and they take two more, excellent running again
Broad to Watson, FOUR runs width outside off on a length and a lovely stroke through extra cover for four
Bresnan to Forrest, no run tucked to midwicket from a full length
Bresnan to Forrest, 1 run wide of off stump and guided to third man
Bresnan to Watson, no run played forward and blocked to cover
Bresnan to Watson, 1 run dropped in front of mid off and they take a quick single
Bresnan to Forrest, no run bumper and ducked
Bresnan to Forrest, no run played forward towards mid off for no run
Broad to Watson, 1 run length turned down to long leg

Broad to Forrest, OUT great catch! And Broad strikes, it was dug in and Forrest looked to pull, it came off the face of the bat and a diving Kieswetter snaffled it with one hand, superb take. Seemed to be beaten for pace there Forrest, he looked to help it on its way but ended up brushing it behind
Broad to Clarke, no run bumper and ducked
Broad to Clarke, no run length and pushed into the covers
Broad to Clarke, no run down the leg side, brushes the body and falls short of the keeper
Broad to Clarke, (no ball) 1 run no-ball and pulled out to deep square leg
Broad to Watson, 1 wide and now it's a leg side wide
Broad to Watson, 2 runs full and straight slapped between cow corner and long on, they take two
Bresnan to Clarke, 2 runs cut a touch loosely in the air down to third man, they charge back for two, good running, big boundaries to work with at The Oval
Bresnan to Clarke, 4 leg byes leg side off the pad to fine leg for four
Bresnan to Clarke, no run much better line, fourth stump, and driven to point
Bresnan to Clarke, no run better again, enticing a push outside off stump and a play and miss to a length ball
Bresnan to Clarke, no run blocked solidly on off stump now
Bresnan to Clarke, no run forward to block off inside edge and pad now around off stump
Broad to Watson, no run short and wide, cut and missed
Broad to Watson, 1 wide leg side wide

Broad to Watson, no run forward, struck on the pad and given out! It looked good, did he get outside the line, it's referred, it was hit on the knee roll, going over? Yep it is, a good referral by Watson, the ball going over leg stump according to Hawk Eye, only just though, a millimetre from the b
Broad to Watson, no run forward to solidly block now to a similar line
Broad to Watson, 1 wide another leg side wide
Broad to Watson, 1 run full and wide of off stump, driven off an inside edge behind square on the leg side for a single to long leg
Broad to Clarke, no run back of a length and blocked down the wicket
Broad to Clarke, no run stayed back to cut into the off side but can only find cover
Bresnan to Watson, 1 run cut hard down to third man
Bresnan to Clarke, no run full and wide, swung at and missed
Bresnan to Clarke, 1 wide another leg side wide, there have been quite a few by England so far, hasn't been the most disciplined bowling display
Bresnan to Clarke, 1 run full and tucked to midwicket where they run on a misfield
Bresnan to Watson, no run forward on off stump and pushed up to mid off
Bresnan to Watson, 1 run guided down behind square on the off side for a single
Bresnan to Clarke, FOUR runs short and cut for four
Broad to Watson, no run full and played into midwicket

Broad to Watson, no run forward, another large lbw shout was it pad first? It was given not out but England refer this, outside the line for me. It's definitely pad first but he was outside off stump, not the best referral from England
Broad to Watson, FOUR runs too straight and with long leg up in the circle that is a very poor line, flicked for four
Broad to Watson, no run full and pushed into the off side
Broad to Watson, 1 run they take a very very sharp single to midwicket and a direct hit gets him but the back-hand throw from Bell misses coming in from mid on, a poor run
Broad to Clarke, no run length outside off and left
Dernbach to Watson, FOUR runs full and swung just past midwicket for four, a diving Bell couldn't get there
Dernbach to Watson, no run blocked into the off side
Dernbach to Watson, 1 run slower ball, waited for and cut down to third man
Dernbach to Clarke, no run length and blocked around off stump
Dernbach to Clarke, no run length and driven to mid off, that was timed quite well
Dernbach to Clarke, 2 runs slower ball, Clarke defends and gets an outside edge that runs fine to third man
Bopara to Watson, 1 run chopped to third man for a single
Bopara to Clarke, no run angled in, Clarke blocks forward off inside edge and pad to midwicket

Bopara to Clarke, OUT but this is edged behind! Goodness me I did not expect that, a little cutter outside off and Clarke feathers it low to Kieswetter. It was a good length and Clarke pushed at it and got a thing edge through to the keeper, good area from Bopara and a mistake from Clarke
Bopara to Bailey, 2 runs back-cut to third man, told you it was easy runs
Bopara to Bailey, no run length and pushed to point
Bopara to Bailey, no run played to the square fielder again
Swann to Watson, no run length, back foot punch to the right of Swann
Swann to Watson, 2 runs outside off, cut in front of the the cover sweeper
Swann to Watson, no run tucked to midwicket
Swann to Watson, no run length and worked into the leg side
Swann to Watson, no run a skip down and clipped back to the bowler
Swann to Watson, no run forward outside off and blocked
Bopara to Bailey, 1 run full and driven down off an edge to third man
Bopara to Watson, 1 run third man fielding again
Bopara to Bailey, 1 run pushed through the covers to the man in the deep
Bopara to Watson, no run played forward outside off into the off side
Bopara to Watson, no run forward and blocked just outside off stump
Bopara to Watson, no run full and played back up the wicket, saved by a diving Bopara to his right-hand side
Swann to Bailey, no run forward to a length ball and blocked back to the bowler
Swann to Bailey, no run outside off, turned to midwicket
Swann to Bailey, no run the slider and it beats the late cut outside off
Swann to Bailey, no run outside off again and Bell dives and saves at midwicket, a fine save
Swann to Bailey, 1 run thick outside edge as Forrest looked to flick away down the ground I think, through cover for one
Swann to Watson, no run firmly played to midwicket
Finn to Bailey, no run length around off stump and blocked
Finn to Bailey, no run blocked in a similar area
Finn to Bailey, 1 run back of a length, a little straight and worked down to long leg
Finn to Watson, no run full and blocked back up the wicket
Finn to Watson, 1 run guided past gully to third man
Finn to Bailey, 1 run goes for the pull and gets it square on the leg side
Swann to Bailey, no run flighted, on the stumps and stays a bit low, Bailey chips the ball back and it doesn't fall far short of Swann
Swann to Bailey, no run on the stumps, worked into the leg side
Swann to Bailey, 1 run tossed up and punched down to long-on
Swann to Watson, no run flighted, on the stumps, played down the wicket
Swann to Watson, no run bit of air outside off, can't work it past Swann on the drive
Swann to Watson, no run full and straight, not much turn but again Watson can't get him away again
Finn to Bailey, no run good length ball outside off stump, no stroke
Finn to Bailey, 1 run short of a length, swings this round the corner for one to deep backward square leg
Finn to Watson, 1 run pitched up and wide of the timbers, Watson leans out and drives through cover to the sweeper
Finn to Bailey, no run tight line on off, good length, jabbed towards cover
Finn to Bailey, no run touch short, angling back in from outside off, tries to cut but bottom-edges short on the off side
Finn to Bailey, no run back of a length, pushed in front of point, Bailey goes charging out of his crease but is sent back before anything untoward can occur
Swann to Watson, 1 run tossed up and turned through midwicket
Swann to Bailey, no run defended on the front foot in front of off
Swann to Bailey, 1 run full and the batsman comes out, drives to long-on on the walk
Swann to Watson, 1 run flighted on the stumps, clips wide of mid-on, good work in the deep stops them coming back for two
Swann to Bailey, 1 run tossed up on middle, tickled back past the bowler
Swann to Watson, 1 run flatter, on off and spinning across, worked with the turn through midwicket
Bopara to Watson, 1 run length ball on the stumps, whipped through the leg side
Bopara to Bailey, no run defended outside off on a good length
Bopara to Bailey, no run length, coming back in at the stumps, Bailey tries to heave him back down the ground but plays a massive air shot instead
Bopara to Bailey, no run pushed into the off side off a good length
Bopara to Bailey, no run length delivery, punched to extra-cover, again Bailey can't pierce the infield
Bopara to Bailey, 1 run on the stumps, wicket-to-wicket stuff, knocked to long-on
Swann to Bailey, no run full and on the stump, turned to short midwicket
Swann to Bailey, no run tossed up on middle and Bailey misses with a sweep, hit on the pad but the ball was sliding down leg
Swann to Bailey, no run on off stump, can't beat the close fielder with a nudge to leg
Swann to Bailey, 1 run flighted, driven down the ground to long-on
Swann to Watson, no run flatter, pushed through on off, stays back a shovels to midwicket
Swann to Watson, 1 run tossed up around off, clipped through midwicket for a single
Bopara to Watson, no run good length ball, decent pace and beats the outside edge, genuine teaser from Bopara
Bopara to Watson, 1 run slightly fuller, on the stumps, pushed back down the ground
Bopara to Bailey, 1 leg bye length and darting back, cuts Bailey in half and thumps into the knee roll - looked a decent appeal but may have been just missing leg
Bopara to Watson, 1 run steered down to third man from outside off
Bopara to Bailey, no run on the stumps, turned to midwicket
Bopara to Bailey, (no ball) full toss, actually more like a beamer - called on height
Bopara to Bailey, no run length ball outside off, pushed to cover

Swann to Watson, OUT lofted, high towards deep midwicket and Finn takes the catch low the ground ... Watson goes! Swann tempted Watson out of his crease, maybe dragged the length down a smidge, the batsman heaved high but it's a long boundary and Finn plunged forward to claim it
Swann to Bailey, no run tossed up, can't beat midwikcet with a nudge
Swann to Bailey, no run full and on off, played back to the bowler, hint of a leading edge
Swann to Bailey, FOUR runs down the leg side, goes back, gets a tickle the ball and it runs away to the fine boundary
Swann to Bailey, no run tossed up, defended into the off side
Swann to Bailey, no run flighted, on the stumps, can't beat the infield with a glance to leg
Broad to Hussey, no run good length outside off, left alone
Broad to Hussey, no run pitched up, driven square and fielded by point, whose throw to the non-striker's end is a direct hit, the deflection also successfully fielded
Broad to Hussey, no run defended in front of the stumps
Broad to Hussey, 1 run fuller length, gets forward and drops one short on the off side
Broad to Bailey, no run full and straight, driven to mid-on - Bailey's going to explode any minute now, I can feel it
Broad to Bailey, 1 run on the stumps, played back past the bowler for one to long-on - see, I told you. Bailey loves the single to long-on
Swann to Bailey, no run tossed up on off, dabbed to midwicket
Swann to Bailey, 1 run uses the feet this time, working a flatter ball behind square leg to rotate the strike
Swann to Hussey, no run tossed up, played back to the bowler
Swann to Hussey, no run flighted outside off, pushed short of point, who comes in
Swann to Hussey, 1 run tossed up outside the line of off, driven through cover this time
Swann to Bailey, no run length ball, spinning towards leg, clipped straight to midwicket
Broad to Hussey, 2 runs pitched up outside off, Hussey is busy in the crease and gets forward to punch through the covers for a couple
Broad to Hussey, no run short ball, targeting the batsman, who ducks out of the way
Broad to Hussey, no run full and straight, can't get this past extra-cover
Broad to Hussey, no run touch full, played on the front foot to point
Broad to Hussey, 1 run length delivery, off-stump line and Hussey opens the face to glide one to third man
Broad to Bailey, 1 run full and straight, Bailey misdirects his drive, the bat turning in his hands as the ball skews through square leg
Dernbach to Bailey, no run length ball on the stumps, played back to the bowler
Dernbach to Bailey, 1 wide slides down the leg side - that's a wide
Dernbach to Bailey, no run full and straight, searching for the yorker, Bailey squeezes it to midwicket as the tails in at his toes
Dernbach to Bailey, FOUR runs pitched up on off, basically a half volley and Bailey dispatches his second four of the innings back down the ground
Dernbach to Bailey, no run length ball, defended in front of the stumps
Dernbach to Bailey, 1 run slower ball, out the back of the hand, Bailey waits on it and finds a gap at midwicket
Dernbach to Hussey, no run length ball, coming back in towards the top of off, dabbed short of the leg side but the field close in
Broad to Bailey, no run length ball, chopped to the man at point
Broad to Bailey, 1 run shorter, following the batsman, deflects off the gloves on to the wicket and they take one as Broad follows through to field
Broad to Hussey, 1 run
Broad to Bailey, 1 leg bye sliding down the leg side, rolls away off the pads short on the leg side
Broad to Hussey, no run full and straight - hint of reverse swing? - defended back to the bowler
Broad to Hussey, 1 wide slides too far down leg and Hussey misses with a flick
Broad to Hussey, 1 run length ball in the corridor, steered down to third man
Dernbach to Hussey, no run pitched up, on middle and leg, Hussey misses with a glance and the ball deflects into the off side off the pad
Dernbach to Hussey, no run touch shorter, chopped short on the leg side
Dernbach to Hussey, 1 run length ball, on off, dribbled short of mid-on and they scamper one
Dernbach to Bailey, no run defended into the off side on the back foot
Dernbach to Bailey, no run length ball outside off, tailing in towards the stumps, chopped to point
Dernbach to Bailey, 1 leg bye good slower ball from Dernbach, hits Hussey on the pads as he tried to work through midwicket, would have missed leg but chalk that up as a victory to the bowler
Finn to Bailey, no run length ball outside off, pushed towards point
Finn to Bailey, 2 runs Bailey gets turned around trying to play through leg from well outside off, thick edge flies over point for a couple
Finn to Bailey, FOUR runs pitched up and shovelled back down the ground in the air, past Finn's dive and beating mid-on ... an ugly but effective shot, just what Bailey needed
Finn to Bailey, FOUR runs on the pads this time and neatly deflected down to fine leg - that'll get the worm twitching
Finn to Bailey, 1 run back of a length, pushed short of cover on the back foot for a single
Finn to Hussey, no run pitched up outside off and pushed to cover on the front foot
Dernbach to Bailey, 1 run full and straight, chipped in the over over midwicket, falls short of the man in the deep - more signs of Bailey attempting to get a wriggle on
Dernbach to Hussey, 2 runs pitched up and worked through midwicket
Dernbach to Hussey, FOUR runs slightly overpitched, on the stumps and picked up quickly, clean strike of the ball back down the ground, no man out and the ball bounces once for four to long-on
Dernbach to Hussey, 1 run slower ball, nudged into the leg side
Dernbach to Bailey, no run pitched up outside off, hint of reverse, miscued to midwicket
Dernbach to Bailey, FOUR runs slow full toss outside off stump and Bailey doesn't mess about, carting a cross-batted shot over mid-on for the third boundary of the over
Bresnan to Wade, 1 run full and straight, punched down the ground to long-off

Bresnan to Bailey, OUT another full bunger and bowled 'im! Excellent death delivery from Bresnan, pitched up and asking the batsman to take a chance - Bailey did but his heave-ho was unsuccessful, the timbers sounding a death rattle
Bresnan to Lee, 1 run short ball to Lee first up, dabbed to third man
Bresnan to Wade, no run full and wide, Wade has to reach to jam his bat down on it and Bresnan tidies up in his follow-through

Bresnan to Wade, OUT another one down, caught a short fine leg trying to ramp the ball over the infield! Bresnan's length has been hard to hit, Wade tried to improvise but couldn't clear the man. Bresnan looks like a man who's found a twinkie down the back of the sofa
Bresnan to Lee, 1 run length ball, sliced through the covers
Dernbach to Lee, 1 run full and quick to start with, dug out for one back past the bowler
Dernbach to Johnson, no run full toss, wide of the stumps and Dernbach gets away with it as Johnson swings and misses
Dernbach to Johnson, 1 run another low full toss, this time carved through cover-point
Dernbach to Lee, 2 runs slower ball, slogged down the ground and Morgan drops it at long-on - perhaps had half an eye on the rope, he was that close, but should've been taken
Dernbach to Lee, 1 run full toss, clubbed through the off side as Lee steps away
Dernbach to Johnson, 1 run pitched up and chopped back down the ground, the ball clipping Lee at the non-striker's end on its way
Bresnan to Hussey, no run full and straight, turned short on the leg side
Bresnan to Hussey, no run short and wide and slapped hard through point ... well, would have been if Morgan hadn't cut it off superbly
Bresnan to Hussey, 1 run banged in short and pulled agriculturally through midwicket
Bresnan to Bailey, FOUR runs another back-of-a-length delivery, scooped over the infield, Finn gets round at deep midwicket but had collided with the boundary rope by the time he got to the ball
Bresnan to Bailey, 2 runs clipped through square leg, a lot of bottom hand, worth another couple
Bresnan to Bailey, 1 run full and outside off, slides this down to third man with an open face
Swann to Bailey, 2 runs tossed up on off, spinning in, goes back and drives through cover - there's Bailey's half-century, valuable, no matter how long it's taken
Swann to Bailey, 1 run tossed up, worked off the pads through the midwicket region
Swann to Hussey, 2 runs flighted, clipped through midwicket, good running puts pressure on the fielder
Swann to Hussey, 2 runs steered through the off side this time and another couple to deep backward point
Swann to Hussey, 1 run flighted on off, driven down the ground to long-on

Swann to Bailey, 2 runs full and juicy, Bailey goes big ... it's not got the legs to clear the rope but returns to earth between Bresnan at deep midwicket and Morgan at long-on. Bresnan perhaps hesitated and couldn't quite get his hands to the catch, despite throwing himself full length
Bresnan to Johnson, 1 run full and again swiped down the ground - Lee has to jump out of the way again
Bresnan to Lee, SIX runs low full toss and this time Lee middles it, fetching the ball a long way over the rope at long-on. BOOM!
Bresnan to Lee, 1 run pitched up on off, driven to mid-off
Bresnan to Johnson, 1 run full and wide of the stumps, dug out towards long-off, they think about two but think again
Bresnan to Lee, 1 run more yorker-length stuff, drilled to long-on but can't get under it
Bresnan to Johnson, 1 run full and straight again and chopped back past the bowler for one
Dernbach to Johnson, 1 run pitched up and shovelled back down the ground

Dernbach to Lee, 2 runs slower ball, on the stumps, Lee swings hard, comes off the toe of the bat and loops short of Morgan this time, coming in from long-off, the ball skips past him and they come back for two
Dernbach to Lee, 1 run length ball on off, frees the arms again but gets an inside edge to backward square leg
Dernbach to Johnson, 2 runs another slow delivery from Dernbach, worked into a gap in front of midwicket
Dernbach to Johnson, 1 leg bye length delivery, Johnson has a golf swing at it, hit on the pad and it slides away towards the slip - Dernbach appeals but it probably pitched outside the line

Dernbach to Lee, 3 runs slower ball, out of the back of the hand, Lee shovels the ball skyward again, it's coming down between long-on and long-off ... Morgan gets there but can't cling on as his body hits the turf, the ball popping free and allowing Lee to pick up three

2.55pm: So, Australia manage to hoist themselves above 250 thanks to a handy cameo from Lee, who might've have been caught on 3 but swung his bat with gusto. That looks some 20-30 runs short, on a decent wicket - though I think the average score batting first at The Oval is something like 255, so it might
Welcome back everyone, England about to chase 252 to win but not just yet, a flurry of rain means we're not going to restart until 3.40pm now...looking fine now, get on with it...
Finally out come the umpires for the second half this afternoon...Brett Lee to open the bowling and Alastair Cook on strike...
Lee to Cook, no run full and wide, left alone
Lee to Cook, 1 run full and squirted down to third man to get England away
Lee to Bell, no run tight line on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
Lee to Bell, no run leg side short ball, a brief cry for caught behind as Bell hooked a little late and missed, a wide perhaps? Not given
Lee to Bell, 3 runs back of a length and chopped in front of point, they take three out to the cover rope
Lee to Cook, no run back of a length and blocked back up the wicket
Johnson to Bell, no run starts on middle and leg and Bell clips him to square leg
Johnson to Bell, 1 run dropped into the leg side and they scramble a run but Cook was struggling had Johnson thrown down the stumps at the striker's end, that would have been gone
Johnson to Cook, (no ball) full and left outside off, it's a no-ball so a cheer goes up and a free hit will follow
Johnson to Cook, FOUR runs goes full and Cook whips it away through extra cover, well placed
Johnson to Cook, no run good length just outside off, left alone
Johnson to Cook, 1 run width offered and it's cut down to third man
Johnson to Bell, no run length, dropped into the leg side for no run
Lee to Cook, no run just outside off, pushed at and missed
Lee to Cook, 5 wide wide down leg side, fumbled by Wade who parries it away but it runs past short long leg for four
Lee to Cook, 1 run angled down to third man
Lee to Bell, no run off stump and blocked to cover
Lee to Bell, no run full and pushed to point from just outside off
Lee to Bell, no run back of a length and played to point again
Lee to Bell, 1 run length and dropped wide of mid off for a single
Johnson to Bell, (no ball) length and strikes the pad, another no ball!
Johnson to Bell, FOUR runs step to leg and slapped over mid off for four, that was a good strike, gave himself room and swung through the line
Johnson to Bell, no run responds with a goodun, shaping away and beating the outside edge
Johnson to Bell, 3 runs short and tucked wide of square leg on the pull, it wasn't timed, but in the gap and they get three
Johnson to Cook, no run left outside off
Johnson to Cook, no run cut hard, into the ground, to point
Johnson to Cook, (no ball) FOUR runs another no-ball! Oh deary me. And this is wide and slapped through cover for four, nicely put away by Cook
Johnson to Cook, no run but this time only an edge into the boot and no run back to the bowler
McKay to Bell, 1 run middle stump line and tucked in front of mid on coming forward
McKay to Cook, 1 run just outside off and dropped into the leg side
McKay to Bell, no run forward just outside off, played to point
McKay to Bell, no run Bell shuffles down but blocks around off stump
McKay to Bell, no run outside off this time but Bell's cut misses
McKay to Bell, no run large cry for leg before, probably going down, not out and they don't review
Doherty to Cook, FOUR runs shot! Wide half-volley and timed away past the infield and it will run away for four, lovely stroke
Doherty to Cook, 1 run now shorter on off stump, pushed nearly wide enough of mid on but it was just about saved with a slide
Doherty to Bell, no run full and played back to the bowler
Doherty to Bell, no run same again
Doherty to Bell, 1 run touch wider this time so Bell can open the face and guide to the cover sweeper
Doherty to Cook, 1 run played into the leg side from a length on middle stump

McKay to Cook, OUT and there is a wicket with Cook caught on the crease and plumb lbw. Boy did Australia need that. Excellent delivery, good length around off stump, it shaped back to beat the forward push of Cook and caught him around the knee roll bang in front of middle
McKay to Trott, no run length outside off and left alone
McKay to Trott, no run full and pushing at it was Trott, played and missed
McKay to Trott, no run just outside off again, angled into the gully, played quite late
McKay to Trott, no run good line again just outside off, left alone
McKay to Trott, no run cut on the bounce to point
Doherty to Bell, no run full and dropped in front of point, Bell sends Trott back
Doherty to Bell, no run forward to block around off stump
Doherty to Bell, 1 run this time they do take the single in front of point
Doherty to Trott, 1 run front foot driven attractively past extra cover into the deep for a single
Doherty to Bell, no run forward and blocked again
Doherty to Bell, 1 run driven down to long off
McKay to Bell, FOUR runs driving forward and edged but short and wide enough of slip, it runs away for four, another good un on a great length and just nibbled away from Bell
McKay to Bell, no run length and pushed at and missed outside off, felt for
McKay to Bell, no run a step down but just forward and blocked back to the bowler
McKay to Bell, no run step down again and blocked down to mid on
McKay to Bell, no run full driven off an inside edge back to the bowler
McKay to Bell, no run blocked again into the off side
Doherty to Trott, 2 runs full on middle and leg, pushed out through square on the leg side for a couple
Doherty to Trott, no run forward to block up on the off side
Doherty to Trott, FOUR runs just outside off and Trott gets down with a reverse paddle fine for four, hell of a shot
Doherty to Trott, no run forward and blocked again
Doherty to Trott, no run middle and leg but this flick finds midwicket
Doherty to Trott, no run toss up outside off and ran to extra cover
McKay to Bell, no run length just outside off, dropped to point
McKay to Bell, no run Bell stepped down again and blocked a length ball back to the bowler
McKay to Bell, no run pushed square on the off side from a length
McKay to Bell, 1 run outside off, guided to third man
McKay to Trott, FOUR runs too full and wide enough for Trott to get out to it and drive past extra cover for four, well timed
McKay to Trott, 1 run chopped into the ground and it balloons over gully to third man
Johnson to Trott, no run played forward on middle and off back to the bowler
Johnson to Trott, no run played to point from a length around off stump
Johnson to Trott, 3 runs a step to leg and a tuck past midwicket, very Trott, doesn't go for four but more runs to tick the score along
Johnson to Bell, 4 leg byes short and leg side, comes off the thigh pad I think and runs very fine past the wicketkeeper for four, caught Bell on the hip in fact
Johnson to Bell, no run forward and blocked to point
Johnson to Bell, 1 run middle stump line, Bell comes forward and plays into midwicket for a single
Watson to Bell, 1 run length ball, sliding towards leg stump, closes the face for one through square leg
Watson to Trott, no run line and length outside off stump, pushed towards cover coming forward
Watson to Trott, 1 wide drifts too far down leg - that's a wide
Watson to Trott, 1 run pitched up outside the line of off, driven in front of square
Watson to Bell, no run defended into the off side from a good length ball

Watson to Bell, no run edged and taken ... but it didn't quite carry to Wade! Bell opened the face, trying to guide the ball to third man, got a thick edge but if bounced just short of the wicketkeeper's outstretched right hand
Watson to Bell, 1 run straighter line, turned through midwicket
Johnson to Bell, no run full and straight, blocked into the on side
Johnson to Bell, no run length ball, angled across the right-hander, pushed towards cover
Johnson to Bell, no run back of a length, deflected down on to the wicket, via bat and pad, playing back
Johnson to Bell, 1 run fuller length, nudged into a gap between point and cover
Johnson to Trott, 1 run bouncer, wide of off, stays back and dabs the ball to third man for a single
Johnson to Bell, 1 run pitched short, sliding across and inside-edged behind square on the leg side
Watson to Bell, SIX runs skips out and bangs a Dorothy straight back down the ground! Length ball, nothing wrong with it, but Bell left his crease and boffed it over long-off with the bat held high
Watson to Bell, no run length ball on the stumps, turned to the fielder at square leg
Watson to Bell, 1 run wide of the stumps, hangs back and steers behind point for one
Watson to Trott, no run length ball on off, gets forward and punches back to the bowler

Watson to Trott, OUT Trott advances on Watson, gets a faint inside edge, and the ball rattles the stumps! The ball was pretty similar to the one Bell hit out of the park but Trott played with an angled bat - where Bell's was straight - and Watson skidded it through the gap to disturb wicket. Trott'
Watson to Bopara, no run length ball, opens the face and edges low to slip on the bounce, managed to keep it down
Johnson to Bell, (no ball) beats of a ball from Johnson, rearing off a length and spearing past Bell as he plays back - but Johnson, to jeers from the crowd, had overstepped again
Johnson to Bell, 1 run fired across, slightly full and Bell clubs to mid-on, trying to get under it and clear the infield
Johnson to Bopara, 1 run length ball outside off, pushed through the covers for an easy single
Johnson to Bell, 1 run angled across the right-hander, who dabs it to third man
Johnson to Bopara, no run full and a touch of inswing for Johnson, rapping Bopara on the front pad as he stepped outside the line of off
Johnson to Bopara, no run short and defended into the off side
Johnson to Bopara, 1 run length ball, sliding across, walks across and toe-ends a single to third man
Watson to Bopara, no run length ball outside off, stays back a prods into the covers
Watson to Bopara, 1 run straighter line, Bopara takes the ball from around off through midwicket off a good length
Watson to Bell, no run length ball, played back to the bowler
Watson to Bell, no run touch short of a good length, on the line of off, shows it the maker's name
Watson to Bell, 1 run shortish, slightly wide, tapped through point to the sweeper
Watson to Bopara, no run defended into the leg side
Lee to Bell, 1 run length ball, pushed through the covers
Lee to Bopara, no run pitched up around off, blocked into the on side
Lee to Bopara, 1 run short delivery, Bopara quickly into position to swivel-pull, finds backward short leg but they run hard for one
Lee to Bell, 1 run another quick single, this time after Bell tickles one into the leg side
Lee to Bopara, 1 run fast and straight outside the line of off, steered behind point with soft hands
Lee to Bell, no run clipped off the pads towards midwicket, in the air but drops short
Watson to Bopara, no run length ball, Bopara checks the ball in the air back down the pitch but it's to Watson's right and dies on him anyway
Watson to Bopara, no run full and on leg stump, hits the pads but would have been missing
Watson to Bopara, 1 run length outside off, guides it down to third man
Watson to Bell, no run tight line, beats the outside edge and goes in an out of Wade's gloves - Watson thought there might have been an edge but it was almost as close to bowling Bell
Watson to Bell, 1 run touch shorter, worked through the leg side
Watson to Bopara, 1 run length ball on off, opens the face and runs to third man
Lee to Bopara, no run length ball, pushed into the off side
Lee to Bopara, 1 run short of a length outside off, tapped behind square on the off side
Lee to Bell, no run length delivery on the stumps, blocked into the leg side
Lee to Bell, 1 run line drifts across, Bell clips a half-volley through square leg
Lee to Bopara, FOUR runs short of a length, Bopara angles his bat and guides a pull through deep backward square for his first boundary - that's the hundred up too
Lee to Bopara, 1 run another bumper, gets big on him and this pull shot is less controlled, flying to long leg on the bounce
Watson to Bopara, 3 runs pitched up on middle and whipped wristily through square leg, good placement and they run three
Watson to Bell, no run length ball outside off, defended back on to the wicket
Watson to Bell, FOUR runs bit of width and Bell rocks back to thrash a cut shot through square, the ball rasping past the despairing dive of the man at point
Watson to Bell, 1 run touch short, on the stumps, turned through midwicket

Watson to Bopara, 2 runs length ball, Bopara plays a lovely, late dab very fine, Johnson doing well to make a sliding stop at third man - though it took him a while to realise he was sitting on the ball and it hadn't gone for four
Watson to Bopara, no run full length outside off, pushed into the off side
Doherty to Bell, no run flighted on the stumps, played back down the pitch
Doherty to Bell, 1 run tossed up outside the line of off, pushed through the covers
Doherty to Bopara, no run full and straight, defended in front of the wicket
Doherty to Bopara, no run length ball on the stumps, straightening, punched back to the bowler
Doherty to Bopara, FOUR runs floated up but drifting down the leg side and Bopara just gives it a pat on the behind as it goes back to send it scooting down to the fine-leg boundary
Doherty to Bopara, 1 run tossed up outside off and driven through the covers
Hussey to Bopara, 1 run pushed through outside off, guides the ball behind point
Hussey to Bell, FOUR runs tossed up around off stump, Bell goes down on one knee and clumps and slog-sweep over midwicket, there's no one out there - and that's Bell's half-century
Hussey to Bell, no run on the stumps, played back to mid-on
Hussey to Bell, no run flatter, Bell pushes at it and nearly gets a leading edge back to the bowler
Hussey to Bell, 1 run quicker ball outside off, dabbed to short third man, they have to run hard but make it
Hussey to Bopara, 1 run pushed through, on the stumps, worked into the leg side
Doherty to Bopara, no run tossed up, defended into the on side
Doherty to Bopara, 1 run full and flighted outside the line of off, driven to long-off
Doherty to Bell, no run Doherty drags his length short, Bell hops quickly back into position but miscues his pull to mid-on with the midwicket fence begging
Doherty to Bell, no run pushed through, tapped to point coming forward
Doherty to Bell, 1 wide tossed up down the leg side and Bell misses with a sweep
Doherty to Bell, 1 run gives it some air, driven through the covers
Doherty to Bopara, no run leg-stump line and pushed short on the on side
Hussey to Bell, no run flighted on the stumps, reverses the hands and flicks the ball straight to short third man
Hussey to Bell, 1 run tossed up and punched down the ground to long-on
Hussey to Bopara, 1 run short and a touch wide, goes back and cuts through point
Hussey to Bell, no run full and outside the line of off, dribbled back to the bowler
Hussey to Bell, 1 run flighted on off, frees the arms and swipes a single to long-on
Hussey to Bopara, no run pushed through on the stumps, a bit quicker, played back to Hussey
Doherty to Bell, no run blocked around middle stump coming forward
Doherty to Bell, FOUR runs swung away to the square leg boundary, excellent sweep stroke
Doherty to Bell, 1 run step away and cut out to deep cover
Doherty to Bopara, no run swept fine from leg stump but only to the 45
Doherty to Bopara, no run driven hard to extra cover
Doherty to Bopara, 1 run punched down the ground for a single to long off
McKay to Bopara, 1 run length and ran through cover
McKay to Bell, no run length again but straight now and just blocked back up towards the bowler
McKay to Bell, no run blocked up the wicket again from a good length on the stumps
McKay to Bell, 1 run opened the face and ran to third man
McKay to Bopara, 1 run a flicked single to mid off, the throw misses but Bopara overran too much for the overthrow
McKay to Bell, no run tight line and beats Bell as he looked to open the face again
Doherty to Bopara, 1 run full and dropped into the leg side for an easy run
Doherty to Bell, FOUR runs down the pitch, tried to take on mid on, gets it past him but only via a squirted outside edge, didn't really get to the pitch of the ball but still got four
Doherty to Bell, no run driven back to the bowler
Doherty to Bell, no run driven to extra cover this time
Doherty to Bell, 2 runs down the wicket again and this time nowhere near the pitch of the ball has to get down to hack it to leg and it's rather agricultural wide of deep midwicket
Doherty to Bell, 1 run full on leg stump and pushed in front of mid on
McKay to Bell, no run off stump and pushed to extra cover
McKay to Bell, 1 run dropped to third man, just a single
McKay to Bopara, 1 run solid forward push and guided out through the covers
McKay to Bell, no run back foot drive to extra cover
McKay to Bell, no run guided to point from a length
McKay to Bell, 1 run guided down to third man
Johnson to Bell, 1 wide short and down the leg side, wide
Johnson to Bell, no run full and wide, driven beautifully but straight to mid off
Johnson to Bell, 1 wide wide of off stump this time
Johnson to Bell, no run another great shot but this time super fielding at extra cover, Bailey getting down low to save
Johnson to Bell, 1 run clipped into midwicket from back of a length

Johnson to Bopara, no run loud cry for lbw as it beats Bopara on the inside edge i'm sure that pitched outside leg, not out but Australia review it, could be too high also. Indeed pitched outside leg stump so we go no further and Australia lose their review, a little bit out of desperation that
Johnson to Bopara, no run played out to point from the crease
Johnson to Bopara, no run played forward and blocked into the off side

Lee to Bell, no run in the air first ball and does it carry to point? Oh yes it did and it went down by Dave Warner at backward point, it was chipped on the back foot by Bell and Warner diving forward got there but it slipped through his hands
Lee to Bell, no run forward now to block
Lee to Bell, no run aerial once more, this time on-driving on the bounce to the fielder
Lee to Bell, 1 run tucked off the pads through midwicket, the sweeper comes in
Lee to Bopara, 1 run leg stump and worked out through square leg
Lee to Bell, 1 run short and pulled down to long leg
Johnson to Bell, no run full and dropped into the leg side
Johnson to Bell, 1 run short and pulled out to deep square leg
Johnson to Bopara, FOUR runs great shot, overpitched outside off and Bopara times it away from mid off for four
Johnson to Bopara, 1 run width offered again and this is clipped down to third man
Johnson to Bell, 1 run length on leg stump, tucked through square leg
Johnson to Bopara, 1 run length and Bopara just gets caught out by a little bit of in-duck that causes him to play late and get an edge to long leg
Lee to Bopara, no run turned to mid on from a length on the stumps
Lee to Bopara, 1 run very well judged single into the off side, the push avoided extra cover so they got the single to mid off
Lee to Bell, no run back of a length, Bell up on his toes pushing out to point
Lee to Bell, no run full and driven past the bowler to mid off
Lee to Bell, 1 run slower ball outside off, guided down to third man
Lee to Bopara, FOUR runs full toss on leg stump, whipped fine and long leg can't get round
Clarke to Morgan, no run blocked just outside off

Clarke to Morgan, no run big cry for lbw and given out! Morgan goes for the review straight away, did Morgan get outside the line? Probably not but is that a mark on Hot Spot? It might be the faintest inside edge, it was an immediate review, so he was convinced he'd nicked it. And it's overturned s
Clarke to Morgan, no run back of a length and moved to midwicket
Clarke to Morgan, no run off stump and played back to the bowler
Clarke to Morgan, 2 runs full toss and Morgan gets down very low to paddle sweep fine for two runs
Lee to Bopara, FOUR runs settler for England, driven down the ground for four, lovely timing past mid on
Lee to Bopara, 1 run played with soft hands in front of point
Lee to Morgan, 1 run on the front foot, played with an open face to third man
Lee to Bopara, no run length and pushed forward to point
Lee to Bopara, 1 run flashed through the covers
Lee to Morgan, 3 runs timed superbly through the covers, just a stiff block into the gap
McKay to Morgan, no run back of a length, outside off and missed
McKay to Morgan, no run forward and blocked into the off side
McKay to Morgan, no run cut to point
McKay to Morgan, no run driven back towards the bowler, comes off the bowler and past the stumps, was Bopara back? The ball missed the stumps anyway
McKay to Morgan, 1 run gets down low and angles to third man
McKay to Bopara, no run length ball just drifts in and it's angled towards midwicket played late
Watson to Morgan, FOUR runs Morgan down the pitch and threads a drive between extra cover and mid off, marvellous stroke again
Watson to Morgan, no run leg stump and strikes the pad and rolls to leg
Watson to Morgan, no run short and wide but cut only to cover, missed out there
Watson to Morgan, no run length around off stump and pushed to mid on
Watson to Morgan, FOUR runs full on leg stump and Morgan flicked it up and away from deep midwicket, again amazing timing and gets four into the gap
Watson to Morgan, no run driven back to the bowler
McKay to Bopara, 2 runs drive through the covers and they get two as the sweeper has to run to his right
McKay to Bopara, no run length and driven to mid off

McKay to Bopara, FOUR runs edge and four to the finest third man you could place, with the keeper standing up it takes just a slight deflection and that's all that happened there, a little opening of the face but it was edged, four more
McKay to Bopara, 1 run leg stump and squeezed out fine again, the 45 scrambles and saves
McKay to Morgan, 1 run chopped down to third man
McKay to Bopara, 1 run turned wide of the 45 for a single
Lee to Bopara, no run length ball, pushed to the man at cover
Lee to Bopara, 1 run full and Bopara tips and runs to mid-off, who was a little deep
Lee to Morgan, 1 run round the wicket, leans out and steers a front-foot drive through cover-point
Lee to Bopara, 2 runs slower ball, on the stumps, clipped in front of midwicket slightly aerial but into the gap and they get two as deep midwicket runs around to cut it off
Lee to Bopara, FOUR runs full toss outside off and Bopara crunches a drive wide of mid-off this time, beats the man and that'll be four
Lee to Bopara, no run slightly full of a length ball, pushed into the leg side
McKay to Morgan, no run round the wicket, keeper up, defended back to the bowler off a good length
McKay to Morgan, 2 runs touch short, steered off the back foot fine of third man
McKay to Morgan, no run length delivery, on the stumps, turned to the man at midwicket
McKay to Morgan, 1 run back of a length, outside off, worked round the corner to backward short leg, who can't gather it first time
McKay to Bopara, 2 runs in the corridor outside off, guides this one wide of third man for a couple
McKay to Bopara, no run length ball on off, pushed forward defensively to cover
Lee to Morgan, 1 run on the stumps, flicked off the pads to long leg
Lee to Bopara, no run length ball, steered towards point
Lee to Bopara, 1 run pitched up, driven down the ground to long-on
Lee to Morgan, no run short ball down the leg side, Morgan swivels but gets only glove on it and Wade fields
Lee to Morgan, 1 run another short ball, this one angling across, Morgan uppercuts it to third man on the bounce
Lee to Bopara, 1 run back of a length, pulled via an under-edge behind square leg
Clarke to Bopara, 1 run down the leg side, flipped round the corner to backward short leg
Clarke to Morgan, 1 run on the stumps, driven to long-on
Clarke to Bopara, no run tossed up outside the line of off, pushed to cover on the front foot
Clarke to Bopara, FOUR runs flighted outside off and Bopara threads a delicate, wristy drive in front of the deep cover fielder and wide of long-off for four more
Clarke to Bopara, 1 run on leg stump, swept behind square
Clarke to Morgan, FOUR runs round the wicket, slides down the leg side and Morgan gets just a touch on it to send the ball fine to the rope
Hussey to Bopara, no run pushed through outside off, steered to short third man
Hussey to Bopara, 1 run driven down the ground to long-on
Hussey to Morgan, no run pushed through on the stumps, defended
Hussey to Morgan, 2 runs flighted, down on one knee and paddles over his shoulder for a couple
Hussey to Morgan, no run defended on the front foot outside off
Hussey to Morgan, FOUR runs quicker ball outside off, opens the face and runs this one down to third man - Australia just can't plug the leaks any more
Lee to Bopara, 1 run full and outside the line, driven through cover
Lee to Morgan, 1 run back of a length, hooked through square leg
Lee to Bopara, no run defended back to the bowler and Lee nearly hits Bopara with a wild throw at the stumps, Wade does well to prevent overthrows
Lee to Bopara, no run good length ball outside off, pushed towards cover
Lee to Bopara, 2 runs length ball outside off and Bopara swings a meaty pull shot through midwicket, it was briefly in the air but was travelling pretty quickly
Lee to Bopara, 1 run length delivery outside off, tickled through the cover region to the man in the deep
McKay to Bopara, 1 run on the stumps, turned through the leg side
McKay to Morgan, FOUR runs on leg stump, whipped behind square insouciantly by Morgan, who's ticking along like a beaut now
McKay to Morgan, no run full, slightly wide, Morgan has a slash at it but misses
McKay to Morgan, 3 runs pitched up on the stumps, drives in the air over mid-off, into an unpatrolled area of the pitch
McKay to Bopara, 1 run length ball outside off, dabbed short of point
McKay to Morgan, no run back of a length, on the stumps, turned to the man at short midwicket
Doherty to Bopara, no run length ball outside off, tapped to point
Doherty to Morgan, no run round the wicket, turned on the front foot to midwicket

Doherty to Morgan, 2 runs tossed up, bit of room and Morgan cuts, gets a bottom edge, it beats Wade, running away behind the stumps - that'll do it, they run the two needed, and England have won by six wickets with a good, solid handful of overs to spare
England won by 6 wickets (with 26 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Ravi Bopara, ENG
